description: Logary is a high performance, multi-target logging, metric and health-check library for mono and .Net.
releaseNotes:
Release Notes:

 * Merge pull request #169 from adamchester/facade-exn-handling
 * Update .travis.yml
 * Merge pull request #181 from mjul/patch-2
 * Fix typo
 * Address feedback
 * Allow `Value.ofObject` to handle exceptions,
 * Prevent `Map.ofObject` from crashing,
 * New samples for facade usage,
 * Merge pull request #175 from haf-lynx/master
 * [infra] fixes #174
 * Merge pull request #173 from haf-lynx/master
 * [internals] fixes #172
 * Merge pull request #171 from haf-lynx/master
 * [infra] bumping .Net version of Services.SQLServerHealth.Tests
 * [docs] adding files
 * [docs] improved presentation
 * [infra] bump patch v4.0.120
 * [docs] toc
 * [infra] bumping Topshelf in Rutta
 * [docs] update readme heading links
 * [infra] support net452 moniker (churn)
 * [infra] bumping packages
 * [docs] documenting adapters
 * [docs] linkable Facade Adapter
 * [docs] creating intro slides
 * [infra] bump Http.fs
 * [facade] define isNull for F# earlier than 4.0
 * [examples] compare to float constant
 * [influxdb] fix compile-error
 * [infra] bumping dependencies
 * [datamodel] upgrade of Scaled
 * [datamodel] docs & Units.Scaled -> float
 * [examples] templating sample
 * Merge pull request #167 from adamchester/upgrade-fsmt
 * Upgrade FsMessageTemplates and mark internal,
 * [examples] metric samples
 * [registry] handling edge case with no matching targets – useful for metrics
 * [datamodel] Stopwatch.toGauge implemented
 * [constants] making constants literals
 * Merge pull request #164 from adamchester/fix-build
 * Fix build errors
 * [core] console semaphore added
 * [docs] update readme
 * [facade] update facade to ignore the array of units
 * [docs] about console logging – README
 * [facade] correcting spelling of colour and tokenise
 * [facade] making module Literals public and +docs
 * [facade] docs and code formatting
 * [influxdb] C# API for InfluxDb
 * Merge pull request #162 from adamchester/feature/facade-brace-escape
 * [Facade] Fix handling of `{{` and `}}` (escaped braces)
 * [logger, datamodel] adding timer gauge functions
 * [datamodel] time, timeAsync and timeJob on Message
 * [datamodel] move SetNameEnding into Message module
 * [csharp] help inferior compiler
 * [datamodel] +Constants module, using it, scaled Message.time
 * [datamodel] adding "Other o" and "Scaled(Units * int64)" to Units DU
 * Merge branch 'bugs/getLogger-160'
 * [logger] making API explicit, convert to previous public
 * [logging] rework #time functions
 * [core] Fixes #160
 * Merge pull request #155 from adamchester/feature/facade-literate
 * Add a facade TextWriterTarget
 * Add fsharp lint settings
 * git ignore .vs folder
 * [misc] re-formulating some internal logging messages
 * [registry] turning down logging inside registry
 * Move public types into Literate module,
 * Revert editorconfig and vs sln/fsproj changes
 * Attempt to make facade adapter and example work again
 * Test for brace escaping
 * Fix Assert.literateMessagePartsEqual() handling log level message
 * Test LiterateConsoleTarget instead of ConsoleTarget
 * Merge pull request #1 from haf/feature/facade-literate
 * [facade] share console semaphore
 * Use 'String.Concat' instead of 'String.Join("", [])`
 * New line after '->' in most cases
 * Fix argument : type spacing
 * new facade literate tests: empty template, options, format provider/culture rendering, exception rendering from special fields
 * [docs] correcting SumoLogic screenshot
 * [docs] documenting JSON serialisation
 * [docs] update target guidelines
 * [docs] updating readme
 * Address more feedback, comments, indents, pascalCasing. The log level string is also customisable via the `LiterateOptions`
 * [facade] cleanup and address feedback
 * Remove string builder
 * Missing fields render scary-looking
 * improved tests
 * [literate] use context, and token instead of ConsoleColor
 * Drop some unused code
 * remove unused code, reuse a string builder
 * WIP Literate facade theme
 * Add an editor config
title: Logary.Targets.Riemann
